mean_en: to show formally by marking a paper or raising your hand which person you want to win an election, or which plan or idea you support; to choose somebody/something for a position or an award by voting; to say that something is good or bad; to agree to give somebody/yourself something by voting
sentence: Voting is a fair way for selection.
sentence_trans: 投票是一种公平的选举方式。
word_etyma: vot发誓 + e → 投票前需要发誓以示诚实 → vote投票
